description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 5} mod 7.
comments: Except for the first term, numbers n such that 36*n^2+72*n+35 = (6*n+5)*(6*n+7) is not of the form p*(p+2), with p prime. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010
